headline: Show HN: myfaveTT – download all your [Liked] videos from TikTok for safekeeping
description:
Goal: the TikTok algorithm has helped me find wonderful things. I consider the list of my [Likes] to be a treasure collection, and want to make sure I don't lose them.

How it works: This is a chrome extension. You visit tiktok.com and sign in, the extension retrieves MP4s and puts them in a folder.

If you don't have time to try, here's a video walking through all the features: https://youtu.be/BoHOdRxHgP0

Is it free: Yes. (I did test a payment modal once, but users gave me 1-star ratings for it, so I removed it)
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: myfaveTT - 从TikTok下载你所有的[喜欢的]视频，以便安全保存
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: myfaveTT - 從TikTok下載你所有的[喜歡的]視頻，以便安全保存
description_zh-Hans:
目标：TikTok的算法帮助我找到了美妙的东西。我认为我的[赞]列表是一个宝藏，并希望确保我不会失去它们。

它如何工作。这是一个chrome扩展。You visit tiktok.com and sign in, the extension retrieves MP4s and puts them in a folder.

If you don't have time to try, here's a video walking through all the features: https://youtu.be/BoHOdRxHgP0

Is it free: 是的。（我曾经测试过一个支付模式，但用户给了我一星的评价，所以我把它删除了。）
description_zh-Hant:
目標：TikTok的算法幫助我找到了美妙的東西。我認為我的[贊]列表是一個寶藏，並希望確保我不會失去它們。

它如何工作。這是一個chrome擴展。You visit tiktok.com and sign in, the extension retrieves MP4s and puts them in a folder.

If you don't have time to try, here's a video walking through all the features: https://youtu.be/BoHOdRxHgP0

Is it free: 是的。（我曾經測試過一個支付模式，但用戶給了我一星的評價，所以我把它刪除了。）
